name: Minima RU
description: Dapps translated by RU community Minima

dapps.name: SecurityRU
dapps.update: - Using divide forward slash and comments now work together - Clean script now works successfully when using brackets in a function

dapps.name: MaxContactsRU
dapps.about: Set your Maxima profile name and add, remove or share Maxima contact addresses.

dapps.name: Dapp StoreRU
dapps.description: The Dapp Store lists the official MiniDapp store containing dapps build by the Minima team.
dapps.about:
The Dapp Store lists the official MiniDapp store containing dapps build by the Minima team.

Also create your own store and add custom ones.

dapps.name: FilezRU
dapps.about: Filez is a simple file manager that allows you to:

dapps.name: Future CashRU
dapps.about: Lock up funds for yourself or for another to save, invest or secure, and unlock in the future.
update: - Now launches in full screen mode on Android. Tap at the top to show title bar.

dapps.name: WalletRU
dapps.about: The Wallet is where you can manage all the funds you own on the Minima blockchain.
update: -Now launches in full screen mode on Android. Tap at the top to show title bar.

dapps.name: MaxSoloRU
dapps.description: P2P chat app running over Maxima
dapps.about: MaxSolo is an encrypted, peer-to-peer messaging application, which uses Minima
update: - Now launches in full screen mode on Android. Tap at the top to show title bar.

dapps.name: PendingRU
dapps.about: Review and accept or deny any pending actions triggered by read-only MiniDapps.
update: - Larger window to review command output after accepting a pending action.

dapps.name: LogsRU
dapps.description: View and download the logs for your node
dapps.about: Logs show detailed activity of the processes and actions running on the node.
update: - Larger window to review command output after accepting a pending action.

dapps.name: Health
dapps.description: Check the status and health of your node
dapps.about:
Health shows Minima, Maxima and Network details for your node.

 Minima: Information about your node's version, chain, RAM and disk space. 

 Maxima: Check whether your Maxima contacts are connected and on the same chain as you. 

 Network: Check how many peers you are currently connected to and the amount of data read from/written to the network
